officialTitle: Phase IV Trial Evaluating the Use of Stereotactic Body Radiotherapy for the Treatment of Prostate Cancer
inclusionCriteria:
* Patient age \>= 18 years
* Zubrod performance status of 0-3
* T1-3 N0 M0 adenocarcinoma of the prostate
* Prostate volume ≤ 100 cc
* Signed study-specific consent form
* Must be MALE
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Extension of local tumor to involve adjacent organs other than seminal vesicles (T4)
* Prostate volume \> 100 cc
* Nodal involvement
* Metastatic disease
* Prior pelvic radiotherapy except as part of combination therapy for prostate cancer
* History of scleroderma
* Patients with psychiatric or addictive disorder that would preclude obtaining informed consent
